value.title: Add shortcuts to your most commonly used Power BI functions - Quick Access Toolbar
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to add shortcuts to your most commonly used Power BI functions.  To add shortcuts to the buttons or functions that you use the most, you will use the Quick Access toolbar.  Enjoy!   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Avoid filtering issues in Power Query
value.excerpt: Sometimes when you are filtering columns,  Power Query will create a filtering query that was probably not what you expected and it will either break your queries, or it will filter out values you want.  Let me show you!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
